decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the bin store hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing bin store at 118 High Street.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (16 185 PA01, 16 185 PA02, 16 185 PA03, Planning Statement, Original Installation Manual. Received: 04/04/2017. 16 185 PA06a. Received: 17/05/2017. Site Location Plan. Received: 20/06/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The use hereby permitted shall not be open to customers outside the following times, 07:00 to 23:00 Monday to Saturday and 09:00 to 20:00 on Sundays and Bank or Public Holidays.
Condition : 5 - No deliveries shall be taken at or despatched from the site outside the hours of 08:00 - 23:00 nor at any time on Sundays, Bank or Public Holidays.
Condition : 6 - No extractor equipment shall be operated on the premises before 08:00am or after 23:00pm Monday to Sunday.

Condition : 7 - The development hereby approved shall not be occupied until the secure storage area shown on the approved plans has been constructed and made available and includes facilities for the separation and safe storage of glass, metal, plastics, cardboard, food waste and other recyclable materials which shall then be collected and taken to a suitable facility for recycling.  The storage area and bins shall be made permanently available and no waste shall be stored outside the building other than in the designated area.  The lids of the storage bins shall be fixed shut at all times other than when waste is being emptied into them.  Non-recyclable and perishable waste shall be removed from site no less frequently than once a week or when the bins become full, whichever is the earlier.
description: Change of use from retail to mixed retail and restaurant and the erection of a bin store to the rear of 114 High Street.
